post.title: Happy?
post.content: fine weather\ fine sandwich\ Trainspotting\ Vicky Cristina Barcelona\ 3 bottles of pure water\ an unfinished english test\ 3 kinds of medicine 3 times/day\ 2 subjects of tests left\ 2 lazy afternoon in dorm\ lunch & dinner with friends\ Pet Shop Boys\ Dido\ Piano lessons\ and a coming long vacation\ oh, why do I feel happy\ like Iâ€™m floating on the clouds\ Created by X&Y
